snippet: Matt Romney, one of Mitt Romney’s sons, went to Moscow seeking investors for his real estate firm.
abstract: Matt Romney, one of Mitt Romney’s sons, travels to Moscow seeking Russian investors for his real estate firm just days before his father is to wrap up presidential campaign in which he has vowed to take a tougher stance with the Kremlin.
lead_paragraph: Matt Romney, one of Mitt Romney’s sons, went to Moscow seeking investors for his real estate firm.

headline.seo: Matt Romney Goes to Russia for Business
headline.main: A Romney Travels to Russia, but on Strictly Friendly Terms
headline.print_headline: A Romney Travels to Russia, but on Strictly Friendly Terms
